1.content: Choose a character who will gain weight.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content: How does she put on weight?
11.title: Serena van der Woodsen

choices: Her pancakes are brought out and they are bigger then she expected
A cute guy bought her another vanilla mocca
111.content:
This was going to be her first summer in New York City since getting sent off to boarding school and Serena was really excited. Her first year back at school as Constance Billard had been a busy one full of both good and bad momens like getting her first real boyfriend Dan and her enemy Georgina coming back to town recently. She was not going to let Georgina ruin her summer or ruin her good mood though. Since she had been busy all year long, she just wanted to relax this summer and spend time with her boyfriend. She thought all of this as she slowly woke up. She glanced over at clock, it was 11pm. Deciding it was time to get up, she pulled the covers off her, got up, and stretched. She made her way over to her bathroom, peed, washed her hands, and then took a nice warm shower. After she dryed herself off, she walked back into her bedroom. Feeling like just laying by the pool today, she changed into her tight sexy two piece pink bikini that showed off her every curve. She then sat down at her vanity, fixed her hair, and did her makeup. She then prepared her pool bag complete with her towel, gucci sunglasses, gossip and fashion magazines, and her ipod.

She then headed out to the pool. Finding a perfect spot, a pool lounge chair int he sun with just the right amount of shading, she sat down on it, pulling her sunglasses, ipod, and a gossip magazine out of her purse. She then put on her sunglasses, put on her headphones, turned on her ipod, and laid back against the pillow loungue chair, listing to her music while reading her gossip magazine. A few minutes later, a pool water came by and asked if she wanted anything. "Yes please, could I have an order of chocolate chip pancakes with a glass of orange juice and a vanilla moccha please" she said. The server nodded and went off to give the cooks her order. Since she had missed breakfast, she decided to have brunch.

A couple of minutes later, the server returned with her orange juice and vanilla moccha, and told her that her pancakes should be out shortly. She thanked the waiter before he went off to help another table. She took a sip of her orange juice and went back to her magazine.
111.title: Natural

choices: Her step-brother Chuck comes out to join her
Her boyfriend Dan calls asking her on a date for that night
An older lady laying by the pool offers to buy her a snack
1111.content:
"Your pancakes miss" the pool waiter announced as he set the tray of pancakes gently down on her lap before heading off to serve someone else. One of the few things Serena liked about living in a hotel was that you could have room service or have a server bring you food if you were either in the loungue, pool, or resturant. One of the few positives about her mom marrying Chuck's dad was that at his penthouse building, they had servers so she could have room service or food brought out to her while she was laying by hte pool. Since finding that out shortly after she had moved in, she had begun to take advantage of that.

Serena pulled her sunglasses up and her eyes went a little wide as she saw how big the pancakes were. There is no way I can finish them she thought to herself. Well they do look and smell delicious, plus I am really hungry. Maybe I can she thought to herself. She poured some syrup over the pancakes, picked up her fork and knife, cut up a copule of pieces, and took a bite. Mm, so good she thought to herself. She then helped herself to some more and some more. The pancakes were so good that she couldn't stop eating them. They were so sweet, tasty, gooy, rich, and fresh that she couldn't get enough. She only paused in between bites for a couple sips of her orange juice.


She continued to eat bite after bite. She knew that she was making a pig of herself but she didn't care. The pancakes were really good, she was really hungry, neither her boyfriend or family were around, and there was only a few people out by the pool with her and they were each involved with their own activity. Before long, Serena had finished off her pancakes and let out a girly burp. She blushed slightly, grateful that no one was around to hear her. She was feeling pretty stuffed now. She lay back against her pool chair, patting her slightly bloated belly. She reach over for her glass of orange juice, picked it up, and took a couple sips.
1111.title: Her pancakes are brought out and they are bigge...

choices: She is woken up by the waiter
She is woken up by her mom
11111.content:
Serena was just setting her glass orange juice down on the table when she sighed and rolled her eyes as she heard the familiar voice of her stepbrother Chuck. "Hello sister dear, enjoying your morning?" Chuck asked her with his typical grin. He was in usual dark lungue robe and nursing an alcoholic beverage like always. Chuck often did annoy her and drive her crazy but she had learned that that was just part of who he was. She knew that deep down inside, way way deep down inside, he was a good guy. She often liked to refer to him as a dark prince. "I am enjoying myself Chuck, thanks for asking" Serena replied with a small smile as she self conciously placed her hands over her bloated belly. She was not in the mood for any teasing from Chuck about her belly.

It was too late though as Chuck had already seen her bloated belly when he came over to her and this belated action by Serena to cover it up had amused him. "You can relax and not hide your belly. I saw it as I came over" he replied in a coy and matter of fact tone. "Why are you so embarased? Do you think I am going to call you fat?" Chuck asked before taking a sip of his drink.

"Well yeah" Serena replied in a tone that showed that she thought that was kinda obvious. She was really surprised that Chuck hadn't said anything if he had saw that her belly was bloated.

"I know the difference between a fat belly and a bloated belly. Your belly is obviously bloated so I have nothing to tease you about. I think you have what Gossip Girl would call a food baby" Chuck continued matter of factly.

Serena had to admit that Chuck was right. She was not fat, she was just bloated. She had a food baby. She was also a little embarssed for overacting around him. "I'm sorry Chuck. I guess I was being a little oversensitive" she admitted.

"It's fine. It's not like I haven't done anything to make you think the way you do about me. Anyway, Archibald and I are going to play a game of tennis so I will see you later sis" Chuck replied before heading back into the building.

Realizing that she still had her hand on top of her belly, she removed it, picked up her glass of orange juice, and drank the rest of it. She then yawned and realized that she was starting to get tired from her pancake meal. I think I will take a nap she thought to herself as she set her glass down on the table next to her. She then laid back against her pool chair, sliding her sunglasses back over her eyes, gently resting her hands on top of her full and satisfied belly, and quickly fell into a relaxful sleep.
11111.title: Her step-brother Chuck comes out to join her

choices: Georgina manages to make Serena obese
113.content:
That was a bright sunny day,
Serena was having some shopping in New York street !
She was looking for the last trendy dress, so she could at her best for the summer !
As she enters into a dolce & gabbana store, she found the dress that all the girl would kill to have !
A white short slim dress that would totally fit with her jeans !
That was like she buy it before she saw it ! and when she left, Georgina that saw all the scene ! think :
" It would be so sad if her diet screw up "!
113.title: Revenge

choices: Serena approves and begin to gain
Serena disapprove and Georgina thinks of others !
1132.content:
Serena was walkin back home to try her new dress, thinking about new clothes to add with this dress ! until she fell on her nightmare !
"Hiya, I hadn't see you ! says Georgina, that manages to run to found her ! How are you !,
- I'm really fine, thanks, I found the dress!
- what do you mean by the dress ?
- The one that will make me the most beautiful girl of the summer !
- oh ok ! when you'll finish your diet !
- yeah I still have that two pounds that don't want to go !
- You know what, I know a brand new diet that help me to lose 2 pounds in almost a week!
- Tell me about it !
- But it's true, you eat what you want, and you lose weight !
- and what's that miracle
- you eat little of everything you want to eat, you reduce all, and you lose weight !
- instead of mc donald's or sushi !
- No, you can eat what you want, but a little of everything !
- what's the name ?
- the Alley diet !
- Alley, Kisrtie Alley
- Yeah that's what I thought first, but that's the doctor Alley ! let me show you ! I'm sure you'll like it !
1132.title: Georgina manages to make Serena obese

11321.content:
On a table, Georgina put some food, like hamburger, sushi, baggels, soda, french fries, some snacks, and vegetables !
" You really think that it will help me ?
- Read the journal on the table !"
a little book with the words, my weight write on it
- If I follow the book, you lost 10 pounds in almost 10 days ! and she thought, it's impossible !
- I know it's looks a little weird at the beginning, but when you try it , and see the result, you can't stop !"
As Georgina look up to Serena, that one has snack in her mouth !
- I couldn't resist ! You're right a good diet is a pleasant diet ! I'll follow yourse !I have nothing to lose, nothing but weight !
AS Serena was sayign that ! Georgina's mind saw Serena getting fatter by the second !
- Are you allright ? ,, erena asked as she was eating her second snack !
- Oh yes, I was just thinking ! You'll have to go ! I'll have to go out and drive a friend to sport !
- Oh ok ! can I transport all this !
- Oh yes, she answer with a smile of victory, you can take it all !
-You're the best !
- I know " She said sarcasticly !
two weeks later ..
11321.title: Serena approves and begin to gain

choices: Serena find the truth and ask Georgina about it !
113211.content:
As Georgina was walking on the street ! looking for something to shop, she hear a voice that make her smile lik enever before !
" Hey ! Georgy , say a larger Serena with a snack allready in her mouth !
- Oh Hi !Serena, omg, look at you, you're so beautiful !
- You think so ! Actually I have a big problem with my diet but it doesn't matter, I'llca ll the professor tonight !
- What do want to say with problem ?
- I gained almost 15 pounds in 14 days !
- I tolld you to eat a little of everything
- I know but I can't stop myself " ! the Serena's face was now heavier, with a little double chin on it ! her belly has became rounder , and hang out a little of her jeans ! that cover huger thight and legs !
" But I discover one thing !
- What ?
- The most important thing is not the weight, it's how you feel inside!
- yeah ! you're truely right ! That's what I allways thought !
- And you know what ! I 'd like to thanks you !
- Oh no ! I have to go ! My train is coming, and I'm gonna be late ! Isee you in two month !
-You're the best !
- I know !
113211.title: Serena gains weight !

1132111.content:
Georgina hadn't left the city, but was still following Serena to see the evolution of her weight !
She was thinking : " Give me the dress, I know it doesn't fit to you ! "
Everymorning, she was spending 2 hours hiding herself to follow her ennemy and see her evolution !
dressgin like a blond workingclass girl !
She was following Serena in every move !
Everytime that she see her, she was heavier ! that was a double chin, that fall from her face ! a belly roll that appear on a very huge belly !
A roll that wlecome an other roll ! jean size that wnet from size 4 to size 20 ! in almost 2 month Serena went from skinny to dangerously obese !
As she was back at her Georgina's form ! She calls Serena to tell her that she wants to see her, to see the evolution of her wxeight !
Serena told her : " you'll be more than surprised to see the results !
- Oh I can't wait "
As they met in a starbucks coffee ! Georgina was sitting with a coffee, Serena cames, As obese as she last saw her !
She was wearing a black dress, that show here huge body ! she was handling a bag !
- Here, it's a present for you !
- Oh no ! you can't !
She opened and saw the white dress !
- It's my gift to my best friend, you opened my eyes ! and then it's not trendy anymore!
- Oh yeah ! you're right !
She felt like sha falling apart ! all that for nothing !
" oh and by the way, Georgina, is it me or you have put on weight ?
- yeah a little, can you give me, what you eat ? she thought : I lost in this war, but the battle of weight is mine !
1132111.title: Georgina looks at Serena's evolution !

113212.content:
Georgina was truly suprised. Serena didn't gained weight at all. Her belly was just a little rounder because of all food she stuffed herself, but she was still slim. It made Georgina even more stubborn. One day, she went to Serena's house.
-You look wonderful!
-Thanks, Georgie! - Serena said, with a huge smile. - I think your diet is working. I feel much thinner.
"Not for long" Georgina thought.
-Do you know what is the next stage of diet? You should eat everything, even if you are painfully full. It make you even more skinnier - Georgina said calmly. Serena looked suprised.
-Everything? It doesn't sounds reasonably... - she was confused.
-I know, but it is the next step. Without it, you diet will be pointless. - she kept lying.
-Uhm... ok...
-Don't worry, many womans says this is the best diet on the world!
-Okay... - Serena took a bite of cheesecake. After two hours, whole cake was eaten.
It doesnt take long...
113212.title: Sernea didn't gainweight !

1132121.content:
Georgina decided to meet with her two weeks later. She was really curious about how Serena looked. When she saw her, she didn't belived her eyes. Her plan was working! Serena's face was round and it had a visible double chin. Her breasts were bigger, and her arms were fatter. Her belly was protruding and soft, her tight shirt looked stretched. Her legs were more massive and it touched when she walked. Serena getting fat!
-Serena? Hi. - Georgina said, with true satisfaction. She kissed Serena's soft cheek.
-Hey - Serena smiled, taking a seat near G.
-You look flourishingly. - Georgina was desperate to bulid up Serena's ego.
-I think it is a temporary, you know, i get this weight and after a time im gonna lose it.
-Of course, it is still a part of diet, didnt I told you? You gain a little, and then you lose much more.
-And eating everything is so amazing. You know, I don't have any limits now? I ate everything without regrets. It is so easy. - Serena said, while patting her belly. It jiggled a little.
-Im happy that you are happy - Georgina gave her evil smile.
After some time...
1132121.title: Serena to gain weight....

12.content: How does she put on weight?
12.title: Blair Waldorf

choices: Arrive at luncheo and Mrs Waldorf comments of Blair's wait in front of Serena
Arrive at the luncheon and ditch Serena to throw up in bathroom
Get Serena to indulge in lots of food, making Blair feel better
121.content:
Blair Waldorf wakes up in her feather-down king size bed, hesitantly climbing out of the sumptuous beige colored velvet and satin sheets. She then retrieves her luxurious silk nightgown her father purchased on his annual trip to France with his new fiance Giles. She walks down the marble steps eagerly awaiting the tray-full of danishes, bagels and various other high-fat pastries that have been prepared by her maid of a morning. To her slight aggravation she finds an equally sumptuous and delicious-looking Serena van derwoodson standing absentmindedly in her foyer. She looks like she just stepped off a catwalk in Barney's and Bendals's latest fashion show. Blair crinkles her nose in disgust as she eyes her friend out, her perfectly pouted pink lips, her flawless skin, recently tanned by her summer trip to the Caribbean, her skeletal waistline, endless legs fitted in a luxurious pair of leather Gucci pants. Blair sticks her tongue out at Serena's perfectly highlighted blond head before she turns around to meet Blair's puffy-eyed fox face, her bloodshot eyes.

"Blair bear, did you forget?Remember your mom's holding a luncheon this morning?" she demanded excitedly, Her perfectly perky 34B's bouncing with her exhilaration. Blair smiled back at her friend with superficial enthusiasm, practically ripping her jowels from grinning excessively.
"Of course" she cooed back. "I'll just get ready and meet back here in five."
Blair sauntered into her velvet-clad room like a five year old girl and began to dismantle her wardrobe in an attempt to find the pair of leather pants that she'd bought with Serena the other weekend. They were exactly the same as Serena's but was, to Blairs misery, a size 4 instead of a 2. When she'd tried them on in Bergdorf's they hugged her tennis-toned thighs in all the right places. She hitched up her lace-clad thong and pulled the fitted pants over her legs. They slipped effortlessly over her shapely calves, her muscular shines, her thighs. She began to button hastily. The adjacent sides of the zip wouldn't budge. Blair pulled and twisted for the best of 3 minutes but the soft black leather stayed skin tight and unmovable around her bony hips. Blair let a quivering sigh escape her full lips. Suddenly she heard the rhythmic clicking of Serena's chocolate-colored pumps make their way up the marble steps towards her room. Serena couldn't see her like this, barely fitting into a size 4! Blair ripped the leather pants off and threw them into the corner just before Serena swung the french doors open. "What's taking so long?"she asked, displaying her pearly whites with her commercial perfect smile, her brows dipping in slight irritation. The leather pants were flung at the door where Serena picked them up. "Wear these!" she exclaimed, fitting them to her sillouet in font of Blair's full-length mirror in admiration, "Their cute!"
Blair flicked her immaculately manicured hand in Serena's direction. "Black washes me out" she says vaguely. She picks up a knee length pencil skirt and slides it over her hips, zips it. She then grabs a white blouse, dramatic red leather belt, red pumps and Gucci clutch. "Magnifique" Blair exclaims loudly in a lustrous French accent, throwing her hands up. She grabbed Serena's arm roughly and escorted her down the steps and into the elevator. "Ready?" she asks Serena.
"Of course" replied Serena in her not so polished French accent.
Blair squeezes her friends hand. Serena smiles back. Blair tries not to cry as she applies her eyeliner. When Serena asks whats wrong Blair replies its only as eyelash.
121.title: Natural

124.content: Why does Blair want to gain weight?
124.title: On purpose

choices: before she can look at the cover her friend walks up
she looks at the cover and it says
1243.content:
Blair was a very well off girl. Her parents were multi-millionaires so all she ever had to do was sit around the pool all day and catch up on the latest gossip.
Today Blair was just lounging by the pool and flipping through her new gossip magazines she had just picked up today.
She picks up the next one on the stack and...
1243.title: To follow a new trend

choices: Flag down a waiter and order some food
Question whether she should or not
12431.content:
She picks up her next magazine and before she can look at the cover her best friend Claire walks up munching out of a bag of potato chips.
"*Munch, munch* Hey Blaire" Claire says through a mouthful of potato chips, "How's it goin?"
"Fine with me, but why the heck are you eating that? Your gonna lose your awesome figure" said Blaire and then looked at Claire's bloated stomach, she looked like she was stuffed to the brim!
"This figure might have been awesome a couple days ago, but haven't you read the new Celebrity Gossiper, you've got it right there in your hand"
"I was just about to get to it when you walked up"
Blair looks at the cover and reads "Out with thin, Fat is in!"
She then turns to the corresponding article:

Out with thin, Fat is in!
That's right, thin is no longer in and fat is where its at! All the biggest celebs have thrown out their old diets and switched them for much more fattening (and tastier) ones.

So how do get in with this latest trend?
Step 1: Throw out your old diet and just eat the most fattening, tastiest foods you can get your hands on and be sure to eat plenty of them!
Step 2: Stop exercising! All that over-exerting yourself is just going to burn calories and make you get back in style even slower.
Step 3: Also a part of this new trend is to keep wearing your same sizes! Even though you'll be getting larger your clothes will stay the same and you be able to flaunt what you've newly got to your fullest!

"Wow" said Blair
"Yah, so you better order us up some food, Blair" said Clair
12431.title: The Article

choices: this is going to be so much fun!
124311.content:
"Waiter!" said Blair while waving her arm
"Yes ma'am, what will you have" said the pool-side waiter.
"For me, um, a big cheesburger, french fries, and a large chocolate milkshake, oh yeah and a large piece of double-chocolate cheesecake, and my friend will have, what will you have Clair?"
"Two pieces of that cheesecake and one of the milkshakes" Said Clair, "I think you can tell I've already eaten a bit today"
"Your order will be out in a few minutes" said the waiter.
Blair turned to Clair and said...
124311.title: ordering

1243111.content:
"This is going to be so much fun! You know, I've always kind of secretly dreamed about being fat, but would have never dared, but now that its in style i have no excuse not to!" Blair said to Clair
"Yeah, I can't wait!" replied Clair
They sit by the pool for about 5 minutes just chatting about this and that until the waiter comes out with their feast.
"Here you are ladies, enjoy" and the waiter walked away.
"Mmm, this is going to be amazing" said Blair as she took a big bite out of her cheeseburger.
The girls sat and gorged themselves, and after about 10 minutes only about 5 fries, 1/4 of a chesseburger, a small amount of cheesecake and an empty milkshake glass was left of Blair's food and a half piece of cheesecake and a 1/4 of a milkshake were left of Clair's. And the girls just sat there rubbing their bloated tummies for a few minutes.
1243111.title: Order Up!

choices: Clair orders more food for when Blair wakes up
12431112.content:
"That was fabulous! I am so stuffed" Blair moaned out in pleasure as she gently rubbed her bloated belly which was sticking out over the bottom part of her pink two piece bikini. She was so stuffed but couldn't believe how much she loved it. It hurt but it hurt in a good way, it felt nice. She really enjoyed pigging out and was looking forward to doing this more often. Now she didn't have to worry about vomiting all up again like when her bulmia was at full strength, now she could just eat lots and enjoy the weight it made her gain.

Clair was enjoying herself too. She had always had to watch what she ate as she could gain weight easily. She was so glad that she didn't have to worry about that anymore and could eat whatever she wanted. She had always been jealous of how Blair never had to watch her weight or what she ate even she though she struggled with bulimia. She was pleased with how quickly and excitedly that Blair agreed to this new diet though not surprised as she always followed the fads and trends. While she was excited to gain weight herself, she was really looking forward to seeing Blair, the queen bee get fat, and was going to make sure she (Blair) got even fatter then her. She was going to make her huge.

"Wasn't that so much fun Blair? I know you are full Blair but you have such little left. Won't you finish it all?" Clair pleaded with her friend with a smile as she rubbed her belly. She picked up a piece of her cheesecake and ate it, hoping to encourage Blair to eat some more.

"I don't know" Blair hesitated.Clair picked up the 5 fries and held them up above Blair's lips, tracing them about her red lips. 'Please, these 5 fries want to join their friends" Clair pouted cutely. "Okay, fine" Blair said. It was her first fast food meal in awhile and she couldn't get enough of it. She ate the 5 fries and then began to slowly work on the half piece of cheeseburger. She slowly but surely finished it.

"Now the cheesecake" Clair instructed as she slowly ate the rest of her slice of cheesecake while drinking her milkshake. She was eating her food slowl so she could felly watch Blair's eating and enjoy it, enjoy her own food, and keep Biair eating. "Come on, just a bit more of your cheesecake andy your finished" Clair encouraged Blair.

Blair moaned out in stuffed pleasure s she ate the last part of her cheesecake while Clair watched with a smile as she finished her own piece. "Oh I am so stuffed, I can't move" Blair moaned as she laid in her pool loungue chair helplessly. Clair finished her own milkshake and smiled at her friend. "Great job!" she said.

"Thanks" Blair said softly as she began to rub her swollen belly again. Her pigout had worn her out, leaving her very tired and a few minutes after beginning to rub her belly, she fell into a deep sleep induced by her huge meal.
12431112.title: They're done

124311121.content: Clair looked down at her bloated belly and a slight tingle ran through her body. She loved the way it looked and she couldn't wait for it to be big all the time. She then gently puts a hand on it and rubs a little, it feels so good and she just wants more to rub. "I can't wait to get bigger" she thinks.
124311121.title: Clair checks out the damage

choices: Order more food for Blair for when she wakes up
Suggusts to Blair they go out for fast food when she wakes up
1243111211.content: Clair then looks over at Blair and smiled. She was pleased to see Blair's belly looking just as bloated and really sticking out of her two piece black bikini. I can't wait until she gets bigger she thought to herself with a smile. Wanting to rub Blair's belly as well, Clair leaned back in her chair, rubbing her belly for a bit until she had digested enough to get up again. She slowly walked over to Blair and gently began to rub Blair's bloated belly. I am going to make you huge just like a queen bee should be Blair Clair thought to herself excitedly and evily. She rubbed Blair's belly for a bit more before deciding too...
1243111211.title: option 1 happens

12431112111.content: Blair felt something in her mouth, and opened her eyes. Clair was spooning her what looked to be soup, but felt much thicker in her mouth. "What is this?" Blair asked. "Oh, I just called up a fast food joint and asked for all of the grease from their fryers." "Clair, hat's brilliant!" said Blair. After Blair had eaten all of the grease...
12431112111.title: Order more food for Blair for when she wakes up

Try to make the gain realistic and slow.

No vore, no death, no lesbian...

Try to write a long entry.

Every addition is welcome :)
